name: Dark World | Shooter Game |
description:
Dark World

======

Dark World is a Shooter game, were you can collect magic powers and coins for getting the best score you can.

======

~ Stats ~

    > 4 Days of work

    > 1.340 Blocks

    > 27 Sprites

======

~ Instructions ~

    > Move with arrows keys or wasd.

    > Shoot with spacebar or clicking.

    > Shoot Monsters

    > Collect Powers and Coins

======

~ Credits ~

     > Inspiration: @warfame

     > Music: @-Xaf-

     > Menu Inspo: @FREEZING_BLAZER

     > Art and Code: @madrid2030

     > Settings Art: @FREEZING_BLAZER

======

~ Menu ~

    > Click on Instructions for finding instructions

    > Click on Skins for changing your skin

    > Click on Settings for customizing your settings

======
